handoff.summary: Updated all requested documentation for the hybrid G2P paradigm: architecture, business logic, usage workflows, contributor README, PyPI README, changelog release entry, and references (WikiPron, SIGMORPHON, ByT5, COF).
known_issues: A8_tests handoff JSON was not present in outputs/ at documentation time; docs were aligned to implemented code and available A1-A7 handoffs.
ML exception-model path is documented as optional/extension architecture; runtime default remains lexicon + rules due NullExceptionModel.
next_steps: Review and merge PR into feature/hybrid-g2p-paradigm.

When a concrete ML model is integrated, update usage/business-logic docs to describe runtime ML decision thresholds.
handoff.notes_for_integration: Documentation updates are intentionally behavior-accurate to current implementation while preserving the target hybrid architecture narrative for upcoming ML integration.
